title: Unboxing: Sony XBR75X940E 4K LED X940E
description:
In this video we open up the Sony XBR-75X940E.  It's one of their new TVs for 2017 and just a small step below the Z9D series.  For more information or to place an order make sure to check it out at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/108468/Sony-75-XBR-Ultra-HD-4K-HDR-LED-Smart-HDTV-XBR75X940E.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=XBR75X940E_2017046 

Features:
- The dramatic contrast, color and detail of 4K HDR
- Everything you watch looks like 4K HDR with the new 4K HDR Processor X1 Extreme
- Ten times the brightness range with X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO 10x²
- Precision Full-array dimming and boosting backlight
- Enjoy smooth and vibrant colors with TRILUMINOS™ Display and 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping
- Android™ TV with Google Home compatibility gives you a genius TV
-Lifelike motion with Motionflow™ XR technology
- 4K X-Reality PRO & Dual Database Processing provides lifelike detail and clarity
- Live TV streaming, no annual contract with PlayStation™ Vue
- Front-face 3 way speakers for impactful sound
